title: The Wild Revelations in 'Operation Varsity Blues'
description:
Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear gather to unpack the documentary based on the college admissions scandal that rocked the nation, 'Operation Varsity Blues.'
Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear
